main-visual.notice:
This site is optimized for the pc version.
Please access the PC version to use all functions.
main-visual.title:
Welcome to
Dvision Network
main-visual.desc:
Create, Trade and Play in the blockchain based
NFT metaverse owned by players.
main-visual.desc-mobile:
Create, Trade and Play in the blockchain
based NFT metaverse owned by players.

meta-space.title: Meta-Space
meta-space.desc:
Acquire your own virtual space inside of the Dvision World.
All of your wildest dreams and boldest imaginations can
be realized in your tailored virtual space.
meta-space.desc-mobile: Acquire your own virtual space inside of the Dvision World. All of your wildest dreams and boldest imaginations can be realized in your tailored virtual space.

meta-city.title: Meta-City
meta-city.desc:
Meta-City is the wider collection of multiple Meta-Spaces.
Various pieces of content are provided inside of the Meta-
City. In the Dvision World, Meta-City can be owned by
anyone who purchases the NFT Land.
meta-city.desc-mobile: Meta-City is the wider collection of multiple Meta-Spaces. Various pieces of content are provided inside of the Meta-City. In the Dvision World, Meta-City can be owned by anyone who purchases the NFT Land.

nft-market.title: NFT Market
nft-market.desc:
NFT Market is the primary place, where you can trade NFT
items inside of the Dvision World.
Create and sell your own designed items, that are
protected by the ERC-721 or ERC-1155 standards, inside of
the Dvision World.
nft-market.desc-mobile: NFT Market is the primary place, where you can trade NFT items inside of the Dvision World. Create and sell your own designed items, that are protected by the ERC-721 or ERC-1155 standards, inside of the Dvision World.

market.title: Dvision Marketplace
market.title-desc:
Search and purchase NFT ITEMS from Dvision World creators
with your DVIs and incorporate them into your SPACE.
market.title-desc-mobile: Search and purchase NFT ITEMS from Dvision World creators with your DVIs and incorporate them into your SPACE.
